btn.create-fromID: create a new N-of-1 test, from another one

delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete the test ?
create-fromID-dialog-title: Choose the test ID that will be used as a template

menu.varBooklet-preview-info: The dates displayed are indicative as the start date of the test has not yet been defined.
menu.send-email-pharma: Resend the email to the pharmacy
menu.send-email-patient: Resend the email to the patient
menu.xlsx-exemple: Download an example of the file sent to the pharmacy
menu.xlsx-exemple-info: The file sent to the pharmacy will not be the same (it will be generated again).

alert.date: Please indicate a starting date for the test
alert.email: Email could not be sent, please check the address and try again!

email.confirm: Please check the following e-mail address before sending the e-mail (a non-existent address will not be detected) :
